structure.unit: ARTICLE V. WATER AND SANITARY SEWER CONNECTION

text.section:
Sec. 32-82. Delinquent connection charges.
All water and sewer agreements between Miami-Dade County and developers and property owners offered and executed after the effective date herein shall require that any connection charges unpaid after thirty (30) days from the due date specified in the agreement shall accrue interest at the rate of twelve (12) percent per annum until fully paid.
The interest rate authorized herein may be modified from time to time by the County Manager consistent with the legal rate of interest authorized by Section 687.01, Florida Statutes.
